title: Govt added 200 GW generation capacity in last 9 years, India turns power-sufficient: R K Singh
description: India has transformed into a power-sufficient nation, adding 200 GW of capacity in the past nine years. The government connected the entire country with a unified grid capable of transferring 1,16,000 MW. ELECRAMA 2025, the world's largest electrical show, will be held in New Delhi.  ELECRAMA 2025 will host industry leaders, policymakers, and stakeholders to explore cutting-edge innovations, trends, and solutions driving the growth of the sector.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
